title: Mitchell Shiffman, MD

sections.heading: Overview
content:
Mitchell Shiffman, MD, is currently the medical director for the liver
transplantation program at the Medical College of Virginia Hospitals in
Richmond, Va. With several hundred publications and peer reviewed articles to
his name, Shiffman has explored the full range of hepatitis- and
transplantation-related issues, from interferon treatment to lupus.
